"Shichishito". The treasured Kurain Village heirloom whose name means "7 Branched Sword". It is said that this sacred sword represents life itself. Though the branches may appear to be infinite, the choices limitless... ...like our destinies, the sword comes to but one end. One merciless point. And when the silver cord, the fragile thread that binds us to this world, is severed... ...the illusion is revealed and the implacability of fate is finally laid bare...

Today's testimony...?Edgeworth:

(Franziska von Karma... What are you up to...?)Edgeworth:

G-Godot...Edgeworth:
...Franziska is engaged in some important work at the Sacred Cavern.Pearl:

Yeah... Thanks, Edgeworth.Edgeworth:
Prosecutor Godot intends to nail this case shut today. Be prepared to fight like there's no tomorrow!Phoenix:

Thanks...Phoenix:

The impossible flight Larry claims to have seen... And... What that woman is really after...) I will solve them all and bring this whole tragedy to an end!February 10, 10:00 AMDistrict CourtCourtroom No. 7Judge:

...Phoenix:
... Umm... Your Honor...? Wh-What are you...?Judge:

So then you mean...? Um... Forget it. What do you mean?Godot:
During yesterday's trial, the accused refused to admit her role in the crime. But today, she has had a change of heart... Sister Iris of Hazakura Temple has a confession to make.Judge:

...Upon meeting a beautiful lady, always ask for her name and profession. That's one of my rules.Iris:
